txt.en: The Blue Mountains are dotted with ruins dating back to the elder days when the ancestors of the Dourhands ruled a vast kingdom, ruined when Beleriand fell.
Explore the places and settlements held by the Dwarves of the Blue Mountains.
Explore the settlements held by the Dwarves, the old places left behind by the Elves, and the strongholds of the Dourhand brigands.
Explore the old places left behind by the Elves as they abandoned Edhelion and moved further south to Duillond.
Explore the dark valley of Rath Teraig.
Explore the places of the Dwarves
Explore the Elf-ruins of Ered Luin
